title: Sophia in Exile with special guest Dr. Michael Martin
description:
Dr. Michael Martin philosopher, theologian, poet, musician, and biodynamic farmer joins us to discuss his latest book Sophia in Exile, Sophiology and how we ought to apply Sophiology in our lives to build an alternative polis.  

Some of Dr. Martin's Books:

Sophia in Exile:
https://www.amazon.com/Sophia-Exile-Michael-Martin/dp/162138778X/ref=sr_1_18?dchild=1&keywords=michael+martin&qid=1634332461&sr=8-18

Submerged Reality:
https://www.amazon.com/Submerged-Reality-Sophiology-Poetic-Metaphysics-ebook/dp/B01HSNFPJM/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=michael+martin&qid=1634333157&sr=8-1

Transfiguration:

https://www.amazon.com/Transfiguration-Radical-Catholic-Reimagination-Everything/dp/1621384233/ref=sr_1_3?dchild=1&keywords=michael+martin&qid=1634333157&sr=8-3

Dr. Martin's Website:

https://www.thecenterforsophiologicalstudies.com/

Dr. Martin's Journal:

https://www.thecenterforsophiologicalstudies.com/jesus-the-imagination
